1483060.name: Cube Paradox
1483060.description:
DISCOVER OTHER GAME FROM THIS STUDIO:

The Paradox


Cube Paradox is a game where you have to record the same level several times, however, every time you record the level, it will become more complex and difficult. Will you be able to get through the fastest way and thus save precious seconds? Or will you take your time and use every second available? Anyway, the obstacles will be there to hinder you in the best possible way.

Jump through walls, dodge obstacles, dribble missiles and use mobile platforms to your advantage, the more you progress, the more obstacles you will encounter to prevent you from reaching the end of the level, will you succeed? It's just a level, you can do it, i believe in you.

  • 25 variations of Level 1 to be recorded by you!
  • Retro look and pleasing to the eye, with every attempt a different combination

When you reach the end, a new paradox will begin.
1483060.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
